description: A small unnamed island where Toriko and Komatsu were fishing when they encountered Luffy and discovered Chopper's illness.
region: Between One Piece and Toriko worlds

keyEvents.title: Luffy Emerges from Harusame
keyEvents.description: Luffy unexpectedly emerges from a Harusame caught by Toriko and Komatsu, reuniting the crews.

keyEvents.title: Chopper's Illness Discovered
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny arrives and the crew discovers Chopper has contracted Deep Sea Fever.

description: A deserted island shaped like an upside-down oriental ramen bowl, located between the worlds of One Piece and Toriko. The island features heavily forested environment with several ruins of its former human inhabitants and is held together by a central Mush Room tower.
region: Between One Piece and Toriko worlds
climate: Varied (contains four separate seasonal ecosystems within the Mush Room)

keyEvents.title: Arrival at Tou-Chinese Island
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats and Toriko's group arrive at the island seeking the Seafood Fruit and ingredients for Four Seasons Golden Sauce.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of the Mush Room Tower
keyEvents.description: The combined crews discover the colossal Mush Room tower containing four seasonal chambers.

culturalSignificance: The island was once inhabited by humans with oriental culture and kung-fu knowledge. After being driven out by powerful beasts, the Kung-Fu Mynah Birds learned the humans' fighting styles and established their own society.

description: A colossal tower-shaped mushroom at the center of Tou-Chinese Island that serves as a lynchpin holding the island together. The structure contains four self-contained chambers, each maintaining a permanent season: Winter, Autumn, Summer, and Spring, from top to bottom.
climate: Contains four distinct seasonal climates in separate chambers

keyEvents.title: Teams Split to Gather Ingredients
keyEvents.description: The combined crew splits into teams to simultaneously gather the four seasonal ingredients from different chambers.

keyEvents.title: Summer Chamber Battle
keyEvents.description: Zoro's team battles a Banjyan Tiger in the sweltering Summer chamber to obtain chili paste.

keyEvents.title: Autumn Chamber Battle
keyEvents.description: Sanji's team faces an Eight Horned Boar in the Autumn chamber to secure herb seasoning.

keyEvents.title: Winter Chamber Battle
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Toriko battle a Raochutan in the harsh Winter chamber to obtain Raochu Spring liquor.

keyEvents.title: Breaking Through the Cap
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Toriko break through the Mush Room's cap to allow sunlight to bloom the Mango Karin flower.

statusHistory.description: Mush Room existed as an intact structure
The cap was broken through by Luffy and Toriko to allow sunlight in

culturalSignificance: The Mush Room features oriental ring-like shapes circulating its body and houses a unique ecosystem with four permanent seasons. It can sink and rise from the island using an activation mechanism on its top.
